oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of our research was to identify the educational needs in direct marketing and the existing opportunities for training and education using the model region of Berlin/Brandenburg as an example to be able to give the relevant education and training actors recommendations on how to structure the options they offer in terms of content and methodology. A further aim was to identify suitable teaching and learning concepts and other aspects relevant to participation from the farmers' point of view.
